credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Etui fork
description: Three flat tines, flat baluster-shaped neck. Rectangular handle with pewter sides. Front and back green painted ivory, inlaid with diamond-shaped mother-of-pearl and pewter in the centre of the handle. Blade of knife slides into handle of fork, tines of fork slide into handle of knife.
name: Etui fork
